cause.description:
Charity Bags to the homeless.
Bags to include:
--Snacks (granola bars, fig newtons, fruit) --Comb, Shaving equipment --Possibly a shirt
1. Give help to those who really could use it
2. Charleston's homeless don't have access to the simple luxuries of food and clothing.
3. Help get these people back on their feet.
cause.mission: Give a helping hand to Charleston's homeless by giving them bags of food, dental and shaving accesories
cause.name: Help Charleston's Homeless
